mapper.select: SELECT m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.create_time createTime, m.level level, m.sort sort, m.name name FROM t_user_role arr LEFT JOIN t_role r ON arr.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN t_role_menu rmr ON r.id = rmr.role_id LEFT JOIN t_menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE arr.user_id = #{adminId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.id

SELECT m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.create_time createTime, m.level level, m.sort sort, m.name name FROM t_role_menu rmr LEFT JOIN t_menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE rmr.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY m.id
